TopicTitle: Bug when select a destination mission

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone.

I just have bought the game but i think this is a huge bug when i'm trying to select a destination mission on the map mod

here what happen when i'm trying this on Xbox One (i have upgraded my tracking station and Mission control) : The game freeze a lot and any "Activate navigation"  can be selected.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0O_5tRc8YUk
Just to be sure, is it the good place to report bugs ?

On 8/26/2016 at 4:18 AM, Chic_Planet said:

Just to be sure, is it the good place to report bugs ?

Yes this is,

On 8/25/2016 at 3:02 PM, Chic_Planet said:
